attributes.action: pressure shops to be energy efficient and swith all the unecessary lights at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At night all shops in our little town are always brightly lit. There should have emergency lights, but this loss of energy for nobody is in contradiction with what these shops try to communicate regarding energy savings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
